title: How to submit assignment in Week 3?
content: You can submit the assignment by visiting the course portal and clicking the assignments tab.

title: Deadline for Quiz 2?
content: The deadline for Quiz 2 is on the 15th of the month. Make sure to submit it before 11:59 PM.

title: Can I rewatch the live session recordings?
content: Yes, the live session recordings will be available under the 'Recorded Sessions' tab in the portal.
